description:
Want to know the quickest and fastest way to write a book and publish them on Kindle? Well then This quick and easy to follow 6 video course series, will give you a quick intro and understanding of Kindle, then go into the basics of research for the perfect idea to create your first book, then we go into why Kindle Ebook is the best way to earn money, then to the exciting parts of formatting your book the correct way, so you can get the right price for optimal sales, and publishing.

The final touches would be the easiest way to promote your book, and get your name published.

The best part of all is that from start to finish if all steps are followed, you should have your first book done withing 10 days,

This course is going to be the most fun, engaging, direct step by step, way to easily and quickly write, publish and get your book to Amazon Kindle for everyone to see.

By the end you will have a new confidence of yourself, and will want to write more.
title: How To Easily Write and Publish Your EBook on Amazon Kindle
